game.name: Crossbow Cavern
game.desc: A recently uncovered network of caverns is rumored to contain the legendary "greatest treasure!" Take up the challenge of being the first one to explore this underground labyrinth and see if you can discover the untold riches that are said to lie in wait. Take care, however, as dangerous beasts and deadly traps stand in your way to glory! Crossbow Cavern is an exploratory platformer mainly revolving around the mechanic of utilizing your own projectiles as makeshift platforms.
